verbose_text: For example, in platelets alone, it has been demonstrated that citrus flavonoids such as nobiletin inhibit PI3K mediated signaling cascades, and genistein, luteolin, apigenin, and quercetin inhibit total tyrosine phosphorylation and extracellular signal regulated kinase (ERK) 1/2 activation upon U46619 stimulation.
evidence: apigenin, and quercetin inhibit total tyrosine phosphorylation and extracellular signal-regulated kinase
